<font face="仿宋, 仿宋_GB2312"><font size="4"><font color="#ff0000"><strong>1.【工行立减金】每周可参加</strong></font></font></font><br>
<font face="仿宋, 仿宋_GB2312"><font size="3">① wx扫麻跳转工行</font></font><br>
<font face="仿宋, 仿宋_GB2312"><img id="aimg_J0yYu" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img.picui.cn/free/2025/04/14/67fc5dab459a9.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img.picui.cn/free/2025/04/14/67fc5dab459a9.png"></font><br>
<font face="仿宋, 仿宋_GB2312"><font size="3">② 点击（第二周）抽深i豆</font></font><br>
<font face="仿宋, 仿宋_GB2312"><img id="aimg_G9909" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img.picui.cn/free/2025/04/14/67fc5b293fd88.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img.picui.cn/free/2025/04/14/67fc5b293fd88.jpg"></font><br>
<font face="仿宋, 仿宋_GB2312"><font size="3">③ 点击（换好礼）兑换立减金</font></font><br>
<font face="仿宋, 仿宋_GB2312"><img id="aimg_xWH7z" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img.picui.cn/free/2025/04/14/67fc5b293cb83.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img.picui.cn/free/2025/04/14/67fc5b293cb83.jpg"></font><br>

<font face="仿宋, 仿宋_GB2312"><font size="4"><font color="#ff0000"><strong>2.【工行现J】</strong></font></font><br>
<font size="3">① 首页搜索：（瑞信基金） 下滑 进入财富号。</font></font><br>
<font face="仿宋, 仿宋_GB2312"><img id="aimg_gvOhb" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img.picui.cn/free/2025/04/14/67fc5eb732ef8.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img.picui.cn/free/2025/04/14/67fc5eb732ef8.jpg"></font><br>
<font face="仿宋, 仿宋_GB2312"><font size="3">② 进入后点击粉丝福利进入答题。</font></font><br>
<font face="仿宋, 仿宋_GB2312"><img id="aimg_CWLDM" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img.picui.cn/free/2025/04/14/67fc5f7110d70.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img.picui.cn/free/2025/04/14/67fc5f7110d70.jpg"></font><br>
<font face="仿宋, 仿宋_GB2312"><font size="3">③ 右滑福利可进入下一个福利</font></font><br>
<font face="仿宋, 仿宋_GB2312"><font size="3">答案：</font></font><br>
<font face="仿宋, 仿宋_GB2312"><font size="3">第一个：半导体</font></font><br>
<font face="仿宋, 仿宋_GB2312"><font size="3">第二个：加油费</font></font><br>
<font face="仿宋, 仿宋_GB2312"><font size="3">第三个活动结束可跳过下一个</font></font><br>
<font face="仿宋, 仿宋_GB2312"><font size="3">第四个：加两个关注即可抽奖</font></font><br>
<font face="仿宋, 仿宋_GB2312"><img id="aimg_orGr4" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/2.gif" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/2.gif"></font><br>
<font face="仿宋, 仿宋_GB2312"><font size="4"><font color="#ff0000"><strong>3.【交行立减金1-18】</strong></font></font></font><br>
<font face="仿宋, 仿宋_GB2312"><font size="3">① wx扫码进入交行福利</font></font><br>
<font face="仿宋, 仿宋_GB2312"><img id="aimg_U06Jo" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img.picui.cn/free/2025/04/14/67fc61c6c0072.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img.picui.cn/free/2025/04/14/67fc61c6c0072.png"></font><br>
<font face="仿宋, 仿宋_GB2312"><font size="3">② 跳转领取</font></font><br>
<font face="仿宋, 仿宋_GB2312"><img id="aimg_jCe5C" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img.picui.cn/free/2025/04/14/67fc61c6b615b.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img.picui.cn/free/2025/04/14/67fc61c6b615b.png"></font><br>
<font face="仿宋, 仿宋_GB2312"><img id="aimg_JGS10" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/2.gif" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/2.gif"><br>
</font><strong><font face="仿宋, 仿宋_GB2312"><font size="4"><font color="#ff0000">4.【江西工行权益必中1-30元微信立减金】</font></font></font></strong><br>
<font face="仿宋, 仿宋_GB2312"><font size="3">需要有江西地区工行卡才可以参加</font></font><br>
<font face="仿宋, 仿宋_GB2312"><font size="3">① 打开中国工商银行APP搜索【微应用】</font></font><br>
<font face="仿宋, 仿宋_GB2312"><font size="3">② 点击【爱购江西】</font></font><br>
<font face="仿宋, 仿宋_GB2312"><font size="3">③ 点击【消费补给站】</font></font><br>
<font face="仿宋, 仿宋_GB2312"><font size="3">④ 点击【爱购567】</font></font><br>
<font face="仿宋, 仿宋_GB2312"><font size="3">⑤ 选择借记卡立减金跳转到微信小程序抽奖，必中3-30元微信立减金</font></font><br>
<font face="仿宋, 仿宋_GB2312"><img id="aimg_Mp590" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/1.gif" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/1.gif"></font><br>
